Posted By: Nate_Prawdzik (7/8/2010 4:17:18 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
Basically he's a leatherback baloth that's triple black instead of triple green, and dies to artifact removal instead of creature removal (yeah, he's indestructible, but given 5 toughness it's pretty hard to kill him anyway). While artifact removal is not as common, if your artifact does die you just got 2-for-1'd.  
  
Unless scars has an indestructible and cheap artifact, I doubt this guy will make a big impact. I think he'll be fine for the first game in a set, but be prepared to board him out when your opponent boards in artifact hate.
posts.html:
Basically he's a leatherback baloth that's triple black instead of triple green, and dies to artifact removal instead of creature removal (yeah, he's indestructible, but given 5 toughness it's pretty hard to kill him anyway). While artifact removal is not as common, if your artifact does die you just got 2-for-1'd.

Unless scars has an indestructible and cheap artifact, I doubt this guy will make a big impact. I think he'll be fine for the first game in a set, but be prepared to board him out when your opponent boards in artifact hate.
